content.query:
Alter PROC [dwh].[Load_FactCases]
AS
BEGIN
	TRUNCATE TABLE dwh.FactCases

	INSERT INTO dwh.FactCases (
		DateKey
		,CountryKey
		,[Confirmed]
		,[Confirmed_Change]
		)
	SELECT dd.datekey
		,dc.countrykey
		,cv.Confirmed
		,cv.Confirmed_Change
	FROM ods.CovidMetrics cv
	INNER JOIN dwh.DimCountry dc ON cv.ISO3 = dc.CountryCode
	INNER JOIN dwh.DimDate dd ON CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), cv.Date, 112)) = dd.datekey
END
